attributes.action: Bring back Boris Johnson as the Prime Minister #BringBackBoris
attributes.additional_details: We want Boris Johnson back as our Prime Minister - he lasted the longest and has done a better job than any of the other Prime Ministers in Parliament lately!
attributes.background: Reinstate Boris Johnson as the Prime Minister of the United Kingdom

rejection.details: We can't accept petitions about appointments, which includes calling for Ministers to be replaced.
